txt.en: This shard of tusk splintered from the tusk of the Great Boar of Everholt, which slew and was slain by King Folca of Rohan. The Boar-tribe of the Eastfold worshipped the tusk-shard, but it was taken into Mordor against their wishes. It has returned and been cleansed of the evil that corrupted it. Elrond has imbued it with the Light of EÃ¤rendil, and believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
